headline: Advanced Technologies Enable Reuse of 18.1 Billion Cubic Meters of Water
summary: WASHINGTON, May 15, 2025--Utilities and businesses have reused 18.1 billion cubic meters of water since 2019, enabled by solutions from global water technology leader Xylem.
